name: Don't Get Hit (mjmakesgames03)
description:
Description:

Don't Get Hit is a simple 2d game that I created for Mini Jam 85. The premise of the game is simple... don't get hit by the falling anvils. Being a programmer by trade, I sought to expand my horizons through game dev and thus I joined this game jam! Though I am kind of disappointed with how the game turned out, I am excited that I have entered a new world of programming and hope to continue to learn about game dev in the future.

Tools:

Game was made with C# using MonoGame framework

How to Install:

To play the game install the zip file and open the GoldenRa.exe :)

How to Play:

Move the player with A and D

After the game ends, press R to go back to the main menu

Dodge the anvils, you win when the timer hits 0

Don't forget to have fun ;) .. also don't get hit lol
